data.entry: San Francisco startup The Hustle started out as a newsletter built to promote Hustle Con, a free event for startup founders and young people on the make. In the year ahead, it plans to try to turn itself into a service-oriented media brand, not just with more ticketed events but a software and product recommendation service.
